Class Match

  • java.lang.Object
    • Match

  • public class Match
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the core element of the Live Report package in that it keeps track of 2 members of the Player class who are matched against each other as well as providing methods for formatting output about particular matches. Note that this class does not check for validity of the Player objects that it accepts, so setting those up should be done outside of the constructor.

    This class is immutable

    Made for MHack - Fall 2013

    Version:
    %I%, %G%
    Author:
    packrat386

      • toTLHeader

        public java.lang.String toTLHeader()
        Returns a String that shows the 2 players in the match as tlpd links
        Returns:
        Header String

      • toTLResult

        public java.lang.String toTLResult()
        Returns sets formatted for the overall results section of a live report. The number of sets is equal to bestOf and they are in the format player1 <> player2. The player names are tlpdize.
        Returns:
        overall results string

      • toTLSpoilerfree

        public java.lang.String toTLSpoilerfree()
        Returns sets formatted for the spoiler free results section of a live report. The number of sets is equal to bestOf and they are in the format player1 <> player 2. The player names are tlpdized. The match is placed inside a spoiler tag, and each set is placed inside a separate, numbered spoiler tag.
        Returns:
        spoiler free results string

      • emptyTLResult

        public static java.lang.String emptyTLResult(int boX)
        Returns sets formatted for the overall results section of a live report, for a match in which the players are not yet determined. The number of sets is equal to boX and they are in the format TBD <> TBD.
        Returns:
        Overall result for an empty match

      • emptyTLSpoilerfree

        public static java.lang.String emptyTLSpoilerfree(int boX)
        Returns sets formatted for the Spoilerfree results section of a live report for a match in which the players are not yet determined. The number of sets is equal to boX and they are in the format TBD <> TBD. The entire match is in a spoiler tag, and each set is in an individual spoiler tag.
        Parameters:
        boX - an integer for the number of sets in the match
        Returns:
        spoiler free results string

      • emptyTLSpoilerfree

        public static java.lang.String emptyTLSpoilerfree(int boX,
                                  java.lang.String title)
        Returns sets formatted for the Spoilerfree results section of a live report for a match in which the players are not yet determined. The number of sets is equal to boX and they are in the format TBD <> TBD. The entire match is in a spoiler tag titled with title, and each set is in an individual spoiler tag.
        Parameters:
        boX - an integer for the number of sets in the match
        title - a String for the title of the empty match
        Returns:
        spoiler free results string
